title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate, with a total of 15 data points.
Overall Inflation rate has increased over the Year.
Inflation rate is roughly constant from 2010 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2024.
Max Inflation rate about 3.14 was recorded at Year 2011
Min Inflation rate about 0.12 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2022 to 2024.
But, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2020 to 2022.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2018 to 2020.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
